content.detailedDescription: Driving home on route 3 south in massachusetts. while in the car, i witnessed a horse shoe shaped beam of light glowing in the color of a led light (white with a blue-ish tone). it flashed really quickly then moved forward slightly, showed the light in the horse shoe shape again and then disappeared. i was sober and have seen very close shooting stars, this was unlike anything i've ever seen before. and i'm the kind of person that looks at the sky at night fairly often just because it is beautiful. i've never seen anything like this before.I was in disbelief because even though i've done a lot of research in this field, i still doubted myself. i know what i saw, and i have full confidence that this was a ufo.
content.summary: Horse shoe shaped with a pointed top. the color looked like a led light color. it flashed then moved forward, flash again then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Summer 2012
it was aprox 9:00pm. the sky was clear. me and my 2 neighbors were sitting outside on the front steps chatting. my neighbor had been telling me that he kept seeing a red glowing light that would appear in the sky right in front of out houses at the same time for 3 nights that week. it would hover in the sky and shoot up into the sky. that night all three of us witnessed this red glowing large ball of light heading towards our homes. it hovered in one spot for a few minutes. then it started to move north of us. we walked towards the street to follow it. my friend josh walked down the street but lost sight of it as there was a large tree blocking his view. me and my other neighbor marcia kept our eye on the object. it hovered again and then shot up into the sky! it vanished infront of our eyes. if i had blinked, i would have missed it disappear. i always believed in aliens and ufos before. that night was deffinetly one of the most amazing experiences iv ever had.
content.summary: Glowing red object 2012 canada

content.detailedDescription: I live in mt.Olive nc, last night i saw an orange ball of light- similar to a star. i watched it hover about 50 ft. it could faintly be seen spinning. it was emitting a bright orange light but barely visible was a red and green flashes of light.
content.summary: Something told me to get off the couch and look outside after the dogs were barking ferociously at something. when i looked a cross the road at neighbors house, i saw a orange star like ball of light appear then rise above tree level.

content.detailedDescription: I live in mt.Olive nc, last night i saw an orange ball of light- similar to a star. i watched it hover about 50 ft. it could faintly be seen spinning. it was emitting a bright orange light but barely visible was a red and green flashes of light.
content.summary: Something told me to get off the couch and look outside after the dogs were barking ferociously at something. when i looked a cross the road at neighbors house, i saw a orange star like ball of light appear then rise above tree level.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home when i noticed a cigar shaped light traveling too slowly to be a plane.  i pulled off the road to safely take some pictures and it changed shape.  i'd say the entire observation was around a minute long.

if there was a way to remove the personal information from my images, i'd be happy to submit them.  thank you.
content.summary: A cigar shaped light traveling too slowly to be a plane changed shape.

content.detailedDescription: Saw on tv, history channel, the same thing. while they were interviewing the person, they recorded red basketball size lights over the ocean. they also looked at video he took at the beach and at a lake near his home. these red lights were visable for about 3 min. there were people with lazors on the beach and you could see the trail of the lazor and what it looked like, so it wasn't a lazor. these were balls of light over the ocean about where the waves break. they were zooming around each other in a 10 foot area as if they were playing, and then just disapeared.
content.summary: Red balls of light over the ocean, maybe 200 feet away.

content.detailedDescription: This took place in the autumn of either 1980 or 1981. it was evening and i was sitting in our basement watching tv. i noticed that it was unusually bright outside compared with the normal light from the streetlight. i went out into the front yard and began to look around. after about one min i had a feeling of something moving to my left. i turned to look and at about 1 ft off the ground there was a football sized and shaped object that glowed a blue green color hovering near the base of the evergreen tree on the north side of our lot. when i looked at it it immediately made a straight ascending path to the north west with a slight curve to the west. it disappeared at about 30 deg to the horizon in the northwest sky. i have never heard of any similar sightings.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing football shaped orb.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working in the oil field just north of the wipp site near carlsbad nm i worked on a hot oiler truck that heats up oil in oil tanks to get the water to drop out i was on top of the tanks walk way when a lighted disk flew by at a low and fast north direction i could feel the wind when it went by about 3 or 4 sec. later what looked to be a f-16 fighter jet flew over not more then 5 or 600 feet above me i watched them for about 2 min. and then the were gone . this happened to me more then 1 time from 1996 to 1999 other drivers talked about strange things they had seen around the wipp site also we use to say they must be on there way to roswell !!!!
we did not have cell phones just two way radios
content.summary: Seen ufo fly by seconts later f-16 jet fly by in same direction

content.detailedDescription:
As told to asd by phone (witness wishes to remain anonymous and did not want his phone number put in the report but i have it)

"i was 11 years old at the time and was with my brother who was age 13 and my mother and grandmother. we were helping to take laundry off the line in the back yard of my grandmother's hose at dusk when we all noticed a very bright light in the sky that was on a straight-line path directly towards us from very high and far away but getting closer and closer to us very quickly, and getting larger in size as well. the object stopped right over the rail yard which was located right next to my grandmother's house. it was about 50' across. it hovered there, and we all just stood in amazement, wondering what the heck it was. after a few minutes more objects appeared. they came from far away in the sky and stopped on the left and right sides of the large object. the other objects were very small and there were a lot of them, maybe 20 or 30 total. they were all very bright white and you could tell there was a structure to them but the lights were so bright we could not see what the structure was. then all of a sudden, they all shot straight up and out of sight in a second. the whole town saw it and talked about it for years afterwards. no one knew was the objects were, but we all agreed that they were most likely not from here (earth)."
content.summary: Multiple gigantic orbs over rail yard in marcelene, mo 1968

content.detailedDescription:
Ive been doing astronomy since i was a kid, i seen meteors, eclipses, satellites but tonight at approx: 21:50 i saw summat weird.

saw a very low light on the horizon sw, was very bright and i assumed it was the iss (international space station) as it can be quite bright and low. grabbed my binoculars but saw the first pic, a bright yellow light with 4 red lights. this changed as i watched to 3 red lights.

it headed south in an arc then eastwards and i noticed it was being tailed by a smaller object that i presumed was a jet, we get a lot of military aircraft flying here from local military bases but rarely of an evening.

this was much smaller than the larger object though, it was only a few miles away, i could hear the smaller jet but something as big as the thing it was following should, that late at night, have made quite a bit of loud engine noise...It didnt....  it "looked" like a small jet tailing a large aircraft, but the large aircraft made no noise. the small jet ( i could hear its noise) suddenly went bright for approx 5 seconds then dimmed to normal.I'd say the smaller jet was approx an open hand width away from the object in front if you held your hand up to the sky.

the larger lights circled round slowly and headed north, turning still to head back to the west. i looked again through the binoculars to see the second image. it was a chevron shape of yellow and red lights and it definitely wasn't multiple jets in formation as there were no navigational lights or flashing strobe lights.

i looked at the smaller jet and it was emitting a very bright light, on and off as if signalling the object in front. ive only ever seen lights that bright on landing gear on aircraft and they were going too fast to have the landing gear down, plus those lights are designed to be bright from the front not from the side as i was observing it. only other thought was afterburners but that would have been exceptionally loud even from that distance.

also, the smaller jet was made up of two red and two white lights, not flashing, just constant. both headed off west around 22:00 and as far as i am aware it hasn't come round again.

really strange though that there was no noise from the lead larger object and the rear jet was such an odd configuration
content.summary: Silent object being followed by jet

content.detailedDescription: It is not a plane or helicpoter, not a star as it changes positions and moves at strange angles. took photo over the summer. not posting photo, sorry. size of object is unknown
content.summary: Have seen these on and off since summer last night most orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at about 6am friday nov 13th heading north on interstate 57 about two miles from the rantoul exit (home of former chanute air force base) there was a light haze but good visibility, the sun was just coming up, i noticed a bright white light straight ahead of me. no stars were visible so it instantly caught my attention, the light had no colors no flash and didn't appear to be plane or a helicopter, it was the only light and a very bright object, it moved slowly from west to east for about 10 seconds after i noticed it then just vanished, poof gone right before my eyes without a fade, like a switch was turned off, i tried to see if it returned but had reached my exit and town blocked any more viewing possibilities. i was surprised how many similar reports are made.
content.summary: Bright white moving east to west short time then vanished,

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to school as usual when i saw this diamond shaped object hovering over the sky giving of lots of color and sound. i thought it was a jet but a jet wouldn't give off colors like that.
content.summary: Diamond shaped and giving off a rainbow of colors

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i were on a walk around 7:00 pm.  we observer a large square/rectangular black object slowly traversing north from the wsw.  no wind that day.  we watched as the object continued north then it just stopped, in mid air.  held there about 1 minute, then its direction changed to traveling nw.  no sound, no lights.  as it changed direction the shape changed to a rectangle with a corner sliced off from one corner to center line.  as this happened the higher side turned more metallic silver.  very strange.  my husband and i went thru all things we knew about airial objects.  no way it was a box kite, didn't move or behave like a kite.  it wasn't a hovercraft, remote control, way to big, and maintained the same elevation the entire time. no wobbling like the remote control objects do. plus there was no sound.  hubby and i were both in a state of amazement.  we realized it was a ufo when it just stopped moving and just hung in the air not moving at all.  it moved in a northwest direction until we lost site of it.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was on a walk when sighted a huge black rectangular/square with an xthru the square

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i were on a walk around 7:00 pm.  we observer a large square/rectangular black object slowly traversing north from the wsw.  no wind that day.  we watched as the object continued north then it just stopped, in mid air.  held there about 1 minute, then its direction changed to traveling nw.  no sound, no lights.  as it changed direction the shape changed to a rectangle with a corner sliced off from one corner to center line.  as this happened the higher side turned more metallic silver.  very strange.  my husband and i went thru all things we knew about airial objects.  no way it was a box kite, didn't move or behave like a kite.  it wasn't a hovercraft, remote control, way to big, and maintained the same elevation the entire time. no wobbling like the remote control objects do. plus there was no sound.  hubby and i were both in a state of amazement.  we realized it was a ufo when it just stopped moving and just hung in the air not moving at all.  it moved in a northwest direction until we lost site of it.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was on a walk when sighted a huge black rectangular/square with an xthru the square

content.detailedDescription: I was 14yrs old and a meteor shower was going to be visible that night.  my friends mom asked if we wanted to go outside the city and watch for shooting stars.  we did. so we drove out to the south side of east lansing where the agricultural part of the college is and its basically farm land south of the campus. visibility would be a little better there being that we lived in downtown lansing. (lansing and east lansing are seperate neighboring citys) not more then 3 min after we laid our blanket out in the middle of a field and laid down did the event happen. "j" and i laid on our backs (head to the west, feet to the east) to stare at the stars when we noticed something blocking the stars behind us. as i looked it was slowly moving toward and directly over us. it was shaped like a fat boomerang about the size of a commercial airliner, solid black with a white light beaming out of the front "nose", a red light on the tip of the right wing and a blue light on the tip of the left wing. all lights were solid with no flashing or wavering. as it slowly moved over us it stopped and hovered in place. "j" and i were frozen in awe and the only thought running through my mind was "whats going to happen". there was absolutely no sound! perfect silence. after hovering directly over us for about 5 sec it slowly backed up about 10 feet and then shot forward and out of site in an instant. immediately we jumped up and started screaming for his mom, who was conveniently still getting lawn chairs, hot cocoa and things out of the car. she did not see what we did and  though it was funny how frantic we were and tried telling us it was just shooting stars. we never convinced her, we did almost convince her not to let us hang out together any more. "j" and i never told anyone else what we saw. who would believe us? that was just the first time i saw a craft like that.
content.summary: Went meteor shower watching with friend ufo slowly passed over us while laying on the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting occurred during my summer school holidays f i recall correct an early weekend in august 1987.

my mother and my step father had recently separated. my mother, brother and i had moved about 45 minutes away for a new start. 

my stepfather also had to change his residence to another farm house in the local area.

it had been agreed that i would go and stay with my stepfather and help him with the move.

we had spent around 5 years living at thimbleby cottage, st marks road, holbeach st matthew. lincs. pe12 8eq

our house was situated pretty much in the middle of nowhere in the holbeach fens, and pretty much one of the last occupied houses before the raf holbeach bombing range.

the raf holbeach bombing range was used most week days for raf and usaf bombing and gun range exercise and practice.

at this time in my life of was 12 years old and really wanted to join the airforce and dreamed of being a pilot as most kids do.

but because where we lived the sound of military aircraft was an absolute constant in our lives.
and as a child my younger brother and i who both played outside every minute we were not in school (one tv, no home phone and no video games in our house back then) we would play a game to identify every aircraft bombing on the range by sound alone.

now when you hear these thing daily, it becomes easier than you think to tell the difference between the planes in service at that time.

planes heard on a daily basis were

a10 thunderbolt usaf(distinct turbine engine and cannon burst) best sound in the sky as kids... a real gun, and amusing at times as boys.

f111 usaf swing wing bomber (was quite modern at the time)

tornado ids raf bomber
f4 phantom  raf
harrier   raf
jaguar   raf

we even saw the vulcan training before the falklands (last combat service)

i aslo rember walking home from school when i was just 7 years old i saw a plane crash on the range in 1981.

the reason i say all this is when you are living out there there are no hills, its the one of the flattest and most un-populated places in the uk. no street lights, few buildings, and the highest structures are trees.

so at night it is pitch black and nothing but sky, and the stars are so clear and bright. 

and again as kids living with this sky we were taught what was in the sky with regard to planets and constellations etc.

so even as kids we knew the night sky... as stunning as it was i gather it would be heavily restricted airspace.

you would on occasion see and hear other high flying aircraft at night, but you could hear the rumble and see the very distinct strobe lights.


on the night in question we had just returned from bemrose farm about 2-3 miles away back to thimbleby cottage late in the evening. i recall the time would be between 11pm and midnight.

we pulled into our driveway infront of our detached garage.

i would always look up at the stars on a clear night, and muse over the milky way, and look for the familiar shapes and dots of light in the sky.

i had never previously seen anything before i couldn't explain away. i would often see shooting stars, the occasional satellite, the planets etc.

but nothing different.

but this night as i look up into the sky i saw a single light that looked like a star, high in the sky moving from behind my left shoulder side. i was facing the house, so i was roughly stood facing north.

i remember pointing it out to my step father, who found it in the sky and stood and watched.

after maybe 15-20 seconds another light appeared behind it and following it.
the second light seemed to be moving slightly quicker and i expected to see the second light pass the first light. 
this in itself was quite unusual to see two lights or stars at the same time, but it could have been two object illuminated in low space orbit or higher and lit by the sun.

but i was amazed as the first light just stopped moving.
the second light then very closely passed the first. maybe 2-3 seconds later the first light set off after the second. i was in awe at what i was seeing. i asked if my step father was seeing what i was seeing, which he confirmed. then the two lights started making sharp turns without any visible reduction in speed. the two lights then spent several minutes chasing each other across the sky (the nearest way i could describe it was when two butterflies chase each other).

we continued to watch this until we could see them no longer. it may have been 10mins, 15mins, or 20mins.

i asked my stepdad what he thought he had seen, and he said as i did ufo.

we knew by definition they were unidentified flying objects.

but we didn't jump to any conclusions.
however with my interest in space because of living under the sky as we did, in my opinion it is ridiculous to think we are the only object with life suspended in space.
although i didn't jump to the alien conclusion either.
all i know is the two objects that i watch for a significant period of time were high altitude, intelligently controlled, moving at speeds and making direction changes and maneuvers relative to each other that no known aircraft to the public could make back then nearly 30 years ago, and still cannot today.

i don't know what they were, but i know they were no illusion or light anomaly. 
they were not any civil nor military aircraft known of the time, nor any of the stealth projects that even back then we knew about.
those flight characteristics are no possible with wing and airflow.

since this time i have been fascinated with anything like this.
however i have never been suckered into many of the sightings that i myself can debunk and identify, which include many televised videos and and pictures. so many objects, especially anything in the sky that appears luminescent is all too often wrongly labelled.
i watch them all, and frown at too many.

all i know is what i saw that night can not be dismissed as misidentification,  it can only be one of two things.
extra terrestrial craft flying above or in our atmosphere, or highly advanced military technology being tested over the bombing range in military airspace. i could only hazard a guess to where we got the technology if it is ours. but i saw them.

i have carried these memories as clear as day with me all this time.
i didn't report it at the time as i had many other more important things happening in my life. in the years shortly after i was in the air training corp (air cadets). basically for teenagers wanting to join the raf.
and talking like this was not a good idea.

as it happens my life took a different direction. 
it was just time for me to record what i saw.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A moving star like light came into veiw then stopped. then another appeared from behind and passed the first. multiple direcection and speed changes chased each other throughout the sky

content.detailedDescription: My mom was on the roof. she saw a light and the light's glow increased and then, the glow disappeared suddenly. it didn't made any noise.
content.summary: My mom saw a ufo on roof.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking into kroger from the parking lot when i saw this bright green fireball streak across the sky. i lost vision of it because it descended behind the kroger building from my view. it was a very brief sighting, but when i went to work in the morning i mentioned it to one of my brothers and turns out they saw the same green fire ball only while driving down the highway. when they told me that they saw the same thing i figured it would be worth reporting.

the trail that followed the fireball was not like a normal straight line that meteorites and shooting stars have. it was green like the fireball and seemed to have blips or small explosions in the trail. these blips didn't seem to change the direction of the object, but were noticeably different in width. looking online, what i saw was very similar to the green fire balls over poland and colorado. even one in san antonio looks very similar, but is from last year.
content.summary: Bright green fire ball

content.detailedDescription: I recorded something off of am radio in 1970.  unfortunately it was on cassette tape and the thing broke years ago, (it's gone / lost).  it went on for about a half hour before i couldn't stand listening any longer.  the next time i turned on the radio a normal sounding, (chicago?), symphonic station was playing.  i haven't heard anything like it before, or since that time. it was very scary, repetitive, yet always different. i think it must have been some form of music.  there was some kind of pig creature talking/or perhaps singing.  it made a guttural sound that no human could possibly make. in the background was a constant overwhelming clanging, coupled with a buzzing that seemed to fade in and out.  occasionally i could pick out what sounded like human screams in the background.  like someone in excruciating pain, or someone suddenly facing some dreadful unavoidable consequence. there was tons of ambiance.  ambiance everywhere, in the pig man's voice, the buzzing and clanging, even in the screams buried far off in the background somewhere. i know the am band can skip, but i have to believe this was something different.  it was either a very strange broadcast for 1970 and the radio station it was found on; or something beyond this world?  i am sorry i do not know what frequency it was...My dad changed the station to listen to the wgn grain prices.  i remember the radio station indicator being slightly right of center, i'm sorry i cannot be more specific.  i would definitely recognize this if i could hear it again.  the problem is, it seems to be gone, and it has been 45 years now.
content.summary: *not a ufo* i recorded something off of am radio in 1970 there was some kind of pig creature talking/or perhaps singing.

content.detailedDescription: An all black helicopter chasing a small ball of light orb. the helicopter had one red light on it but was all black. the orb was a red blue glowing. the orb made no sound and they both were going very fast
content.summary: All black helicopter chasing ufo

content.detailedDescription: In july 1982, i was camped with a friend on an alpine meadow at the 7,000 foot level of mt rainier in washington state. visibility was sharp and clear at that altitude and there was no cloud cover. we were looking up at the sky toward the east and noticed an extremely bright star moving from east to west at a steady speed. we made guesses as to its nature. my friend thought it was a satellite. i thought perhaps a meteor. when it reached a point directly overhead, it made an instantaneous right-angle turn (90 degrees) quicker than you can blink your eyes. it then continued at the same speed directly north. we watched it until it passed over the horizon. we were stunned, of course, since we both realized nothing made by man could make a turn like that. we estimated its altitude at over fifty miles, perhaps in low earth orbit. the object was approximately the brightness and size of the planet venus.
content.summary: Extreme high-altitude object seen making instant 90 degree turn. seen at 7k altitude mt rainier

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling northbound on us route 460 in virginia. montgomery county to be exact. i noticed a shimmering light about 35 degrees above the horizon line, so i decided to take out my smartphone and video of the event. right off i noticed it was not a plane, and it was not a star or helicopter. it hovered in the same spot for roughly 15 to 18 seconds, then it started to move slightly to the southeast. as this event unfolded. i took roughly 56 seconds of video. it been very dangerous to drive and film at the same time, i shut the video off. roughly 20 seconds after i stop filming, the shiny object shot lightning-fast southeast as fast as the eye could see it. i had to pull over and catch my breath, and figure out if this was me hallucinating, or if it was a real event. it was very surreal. it took roughly 15 minutes to shake it off. i got home, reviewed the video several times, and decided to upload it onto youtube. i also uploaded it to my facebook. that's about all i can tell you. i hope that helps, thank you for your time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw a shimmering light in the sky, noticed it wasn't a helicopter, airplane, comet, or recognized. i videoed around 56 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
About 6:15 tonight i was at the intersection of 10th st and johnson dr. i was checking both directions for oncoming traffic and i noticed what i took at first to be a group of 5 possible helicopters to the south toward the spacex test facility in mcgregor. almost immediately i decided that something was different/odd.

having lived here all my life i am very familiar with various types of military helicopters due to the close proximity of ft. hood and am familiar with the way they fly. these lights had a solid red light that was periodically obscured by a white flash, again, not unlike helicopters. however, when i first noticed them i realized how slow they were moving and i could not hear any rotor noise at all. i estimate that they were roughly about a mile away, i can usually hear helicopters from this distance in the area.

i turned down johnson dr toward them and stopped at the intersection with blue bonnet pkwy and estimate i was now within about 1/4 mile or less, still i could hear no rotor noise. i could hear cheers from the football field about 3/4 of a mile away. as i approached, the lead two lights that were originally lower that the two trailing lights slowly ascended and the trailing lights descended correspondingly while the middle light held position, as if all were attached to a single large object. i stayed put and watched the lights (craft?) head almost parallel to blue bonnet pkwy fairly slowly then the lead lights seemed to become one and the trailing two lights got closer together (possible optical illusion due to increasing distance?)

there was a lot of traffic headed to the rodeo arena to my sw and the combination of oncoming headlights making further observation difficult and not being able to pull all the way out of traffic due to the soggy and therefore soft ground made me feel as if i should move along at this point.
content.summary: 5 red lights with white flashes seen near spacex

content.detailedDescription:
Not a lot of details to this story.  it was about 1961, i was about 8 years old, returning home from my grandmothers late at night in the back seat of the car, with mom and dad in front.  we were driving north along lake merced blvd and were just south of daly city.  my dad suddenly hit the brakes and both mom and dad kind of screamed "what the..."  i was on my feet in the back seat looking into the fog typical for that area as we slowed to a near stop, asking "what is it, what is it?", and they were both at a loss for words.  they ignored me, and asked one another "did you see that?", to which both answered yes.  again, i'm asking what was it?  they didn't know.  when pressed dad explained it was as if ghostly image, nondescript shape, about the size of a car, with soft edges, grayish white in color, suddenly appeared about 20 or 30 feet in front of us and quickly crossed the road and disappeared.  
i hadn't thought about it for years until recently, and brought it up to mom and dad who are now 84 and 88, and was amazed they could not remember it.  i don't know how they could forget such a bizarre experience.
so, maybe this can be linked to other possible strange occurrences around lake merced in the early '60's.
thank you.
steve
content.summary: It was witness by my parents simultaneously while driving, very abruptly crossing the road in front of them.  about the size of a car, non defined edges, translucent.

content.detailedDescription:
Going out my rear door of apartment at 8:13 pm on 11/12/2015 i looked directly overhead at in coming air traffic to lax landing pattern, i then noticed another set of lights moving across the traffic pattern diagonally.  there were three white lights in an equilateral triangular pattern, then i noticed that there was structure between lights. the craft was moving slowly at the speed of a small prop plane (cesna172). halfway through its track it rotated right slightly 10 then left 20 then back to center. it also appeared that the structure enlarged slightly by 20% as i observed the white lights on the the tips of the triangular craft expand for 5 seconds and then retract back to original size. the track of the craft took it out towards the coast and i lost site of it at about 23 above horizon.  the complete time of the sighting was 13 - 15 seconds.
i grew up in aviation,  my father was a top aeronautical engineer,  and i have witnessed all forms of powered and unpowererd flight. i can only think of this as some sort of drone, yet their was no sound at all except for in coming aircraft to lax, this was completely silent. the altitude estimated at 1000' to 1500'.Their were other commercial jet traffic above the craft crossing its path at one point about halfway through its track. i really can only speculate that other than a drone it is advanced u.S. military experimental craft of some sort, or ? the craft had an almost flat dull dark grey skin. my reaction is frankly stunned and excited and left pondering what was it i saw. weather: 59f. 49%humidity,  wind nne at 3mph gust to 10mph, clear, unrestricted ceiling. the size of the craft along one length estimated at 40' - 50', could not determine thickness.
content.summary: Looked directly up while viewing incoming aircraft traffic, observed pattern of 3 white lights with triangular pattern and then structure apparent heading 240 magnetic turning left then right slightly, lights expanded briefly enlarging craft dimensions

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were driving home at night when we noticed a plane flying slowly over head. we disregarded it at first until we noticed it zoom extremely fast across the night sky. like i said we thought it was a plane but a plane wouldn't have zoomed that fast and a sitting star wouldn't have gone so slow at first.
content.summary: Plane like flashes at first then it zoomed away

content.detailedDescription:
One sunday afternoon on or about july 19,2015 around 2pm very sunny day with moving clouds. i was sitting in my backyard when i observed one very bright sphere about 1-2 miles high traveling slowly from the south heading north. i went inside my house and got my pair of binoculars to get a closer look. i also told my girlfriend to come outside with me to see what i was iooking at. she saw the bright sphere too. as i started to look through my binoculars, and what i saw was not one sphere but two of them. they were very bright but almost transparent. at first i thought it was balloons, but it was a little windy outside but the two spheres orbiting each other while traveling north bound across the sky steadily.  as i was visually tracking the two spheres a tree in my backyard blocked my view. so i reposition myself north to get eyes on again, when i got around the tree, clouds in the sky blocked my view for several minutes, when the sky was clear the two spheres was nowhere to be seen. so i sat back in my chair and visually scanning the sky for the two spheres. in the same area where i first spotted the two spheres i saw another object high in the eastern sky. it was about 1-2 miles high and it was a very bright metallic red horizontal object.But this 2nd object was stationary not moving. i have never seen anything that bright red before stand out like that on a sunny day. i had trouble holding my binoculars and lost sight of the red horizontal object and couldn't get eyes on again.Probably because the red horizontal object had a much higher orbit in the sky. my girlfriend did not she the 2nd. red object but i did tell what i saw. but i think she doesn't believe me, she also thinks the two spheres were balloons. at first i didn't want to report this beause i think nobody would believe me, especially the government. but i know what i saw. i heard about mufon so i decided to file a report with you.Maybe some else might have seen what i observed too.
thank you for your time.
content.summary: Eye contact w/2 bright almost see through spheres along w/a very bright red metallic object.One

content.detailedDescription: This is the 3rd time this week it has came back to hover over the woods behind my house. i got a better video this time. i have to figure out what this is!!! it has the same routine every time it comes. it comes and hover for about 45 minutes then goes straight back up into the sky. does anyone have any idea what this is?!?!?
content.summary: Keeps coming back 3rd time this week around11 30 pm to hover over the woods behind my house

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on business 29 when i noticed something about 30 degrees off the horizon over lynchburg i just assumed at first it was a plane but then i noticed it was a weird color, chrome, and it looked oval not elongated like a plane i watched it while maneuvering through traffic for a few seconds losing sight of it a couple of times to pay attention to the road after about 25 seconds the object just vanished and i look for it for several seconds later and could not find it in the in the sky anywhere. my first thought was did lynchburg airport see anything on radar that just mysteriously vanished. it was not on what i would say a typical landing pattern for the airport it was actually west of the airport and probably too high for where its location to the airport was for landing. it just seemed awfully strange to me that one minute it's there and the next minute it's gone. i only wished i wasn't driving at the time maybe someone else saw what i saw. i didn't notice anything strange at first it looked like a straight path of motion at a typical slow plane speed (100 or 200mph) the only weird thing was the color (chrome) and the shape (saucer like oval) and of course the disappearing. the reflective surface is what made me notice it to begin with.
content.summary: Vehicle was traveling in a straight line and was noticed through the front windshield of the car vehicle disappeared instantaneously
